Song.title: O Praise Him
Song.copyright: David Crowder Â© 2003 sixsteps Music (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing) worshiptogether.com songs (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G2]Turn your ear to heav[D/F#]en and hear the no[C]ise inside The s[G2]ound of angel's awe the s[D/F#]ound of angel's songs And [C]all this for a King [Am7]We could join and sing [C]all to Christ the King [D/F#] How constant how [C] divine [D/F#] This song of ours [C] will rise [D/F#] How constant how [C] divine [D/F#] This love of ours [C] will rise Will [Am/C]rise
Chorus 1: [G]O praise Him [G/F#]O praise Him [Em7]He is holy [C]He is h[Am7]-oly
Verse 2: [G2]Turn your gaze to heav[D/F#]en and raise a joy[C]ous noise The s[G2]ound of salvation come the s[D/F#]ound of rescued ones And [C]all this for a King [Am7]We could join and sing [C]all to Christ the King [D/F#] How infinite [C] and sweet [D/F#] this love so rescuing [D/F#] How infinite [C] and sweet [D/F#] this great love that has [C] redeemed As [Am/C]one we sing
Chorus 2: A[G]lleluia al[G/F#]leluia [Em7]He is holy [C]He is h[Am7]-oly
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 turn your ear to heaven and hear the noise inside the sound of angels awe the sound of angels songs and all this for a king we could join and sing all to christ the king how constant how divine this song of ours will rise how constant how divine this love of ours will rise will rise chorus 1 o praise him o praise him he is holy he is holy verse 2 turn your gaze to heaven and raise a joyous noise the sound of salvation come the sound of rescued ones and all this for a king we could join and sing all to christ the king how infinite and sweet this love so rescuing how infinite and sweet this great love that has redeemed as one we sing chorus 2 alleluia alleluia he is holy he is holy
